info.title: Football - CFB
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. CFB - College Football

externalDocs.description: After you've been given an API key and secret, enter it below and "Get" the method you'd like to try out.  Fill in the parameters with what you'd like to try, or use the built in defaults, and click "Try It!" to execute the call.  The JSON or XML response will be populated in the Response Body, the Response Body will provide you with any relevant codes, and the Request Header URI will show you how the call would be made within your application. Please note:Also, endpoints almost always require a final "/".  You will receive "596 Service Not Found" when it is missing.  An exception to this is for optional methods, such as eventId or teamId.

tags.name: CFB - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.  If entered, conferenceId and collegeSubDivisionId are ignored.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.  If entered, collegeSubDivisionId is ignored.

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description:
Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division
 Default - Blank (returns all FCS (Division 1) teams).

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-plays, and drive charts. The box, pbp, & driveCharts parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
 Simple schedules are also available via the events endpoint.
tags: CFB - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp or driveCharts parameters.
 Default - basic schedule and score information is returned.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: driveCharts
parameters.description:
Returns the drive charts for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'driveCharts=true'.
  Default - drive chart data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.  If entered, collegeSubDivisionId is ignored.

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-plays, and drive charts. However box scores, play-by-play, and drive charts are available for a single game only, and so acnnot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoitn should be used for team schedules & scores only.
tags: CFB - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide a teamId when you want information for just that team.  The 'box', 'pbp' and 'driveCharts' parameters are not allowed because you are requesting schedule information for a team, not an individual event.
   Default - basic score data will be returned for all the events of the current week.

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, games from thecurrent week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for CFB events. (Play-by-play and Drive Charts are not available in the box endpoint.)
tags: CFB - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box parameter.
 Default - basic schedule and score information is returned.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.  If entered, collegeSubDivisionId is ignored.

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for CFB events. However, box scores are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.
tags: CFB - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide a teamId when you want information for just that team.  The 'box' parameter is not allowed because you are requesting 'schedule' information for a team, not an individual event.
  Default - basic score data will be returned for all the games of the current week.

parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId

get.summary: The scores/ resource provides score and schedule i...
get.description: The scores/ resource provides score and schedule information for CFB events. (Boxscores, Play-by-play, and Shot Charts are not available in the scores endpoint.)
tags: CFB - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.
 Default - Schedule and score information is returned for the current or selected date or week.

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
A full line score can be requested with any combination of parameters.
  Default - line score data will not be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season.

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.  If entered, collegeSubDivisionId is ignored.

parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get standings for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
 Default - json

get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, all teams rosters within the league, or all free agents.

parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: pollId

The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.
 Default - Associated Press

parameters.name: lastNextOpponent
parameters.description: Should information about a team's last and next opponents be included?

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Returns the most recent poll less than or equal to the date entered.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - most recent poll

Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

get.summary: CFB - Season stats for a single player

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The 'enc'yclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
  If 'enc=true', the seasonId will be ignored if included.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & player names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned.
 * If 'all' is used, then all the splits are returned.
 * If not used, only the official totals will be returned (default = -1).
 * Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
 -- A full list of the available splitId codes can be found using the decodes resource.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & player names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Team splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Team ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  * If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  * If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  * Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept

get.summary: CFB - Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Passing Yards).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
To get data for only one conference, enter the conferenceId. See conferences decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - no conference restrictions when conferenceId is not used

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Team Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Passing Yards).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties).

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' teams (trailers) rather than 'best' teams (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
To get data for only one conference, enter the conferenceId. See conferences decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - no conference restrictions when conferenceId is not used

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Leaders by Week

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: Leaders returned for the selected week only. If no week is selected, leaders for the most recent week will be returned.

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.
  Default - Blank (returns Passing Yards).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties).

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
To get data for only one conference, enter the conferenceId. See conferences decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - no conference restrictions when conferenceId is not used

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Coaches

parameters.name: coachId
parameters.description:
To get results for single coach, enter coach ID.
  Default - If no ID is entered, all current CFB coaches will be returned.

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Coaches for a single team

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Enter team ID to return information active coaches for one team. Example: 3438 - Northwestern. See /teams endpoint for list of all team IDs

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CFB - Odds

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - Returned data is for the current week.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Odds for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
For team names/nicknames/abbreviations only. Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name/nickname/abbreviation.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
